text: Niścaẏa yisakalē āllāhara lagata karaā pratiśrauti ārau nijara śapata tuccha mulyara binimaẏata bikraī karaē, ākhiraātata siham̐tara kōnō anśa nā'i; ārau kiẏāmatara dinā āllāhē siham̐tara lagata kathā naka’ba, siham̐tara prati dr̥ṣṭi'ō nidiba ārau siham̐taka paraiśud'dha'ō nakaraiba; ārau siham̐tara bābē āchē yantraṇādāẏaka śāsti
